passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(3) > header:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(3) > main > section:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(3) > main > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(3) > main > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(4)

any.message: Heading order valid
